00054         class udppacket
00055         {
00056         public:
00057                 unsigned long  protocol_id;
00058                 unsigned short connection_id;
00059                 unsigned short sequence_no;
00060                 unsigned short ack;
00061                 unsigned short ack_bitfield;
00062                 char data[_PACKET_DATA_];
00063 
00064                 inline bool operator <(const udppacket& other) const {
00065                         return
00066                                 (sequence_no < other.sequence_no) &&
00067                                 (other.sequence_no - sequence_no < 300) ||
00068                                 (sequence_no > other.sequence_no) &&
00069                                 (sequence_no - other.sequence_no >= 300);
00070                 }
00071 
00072                 inline bool operator <(unsigned short seq) const {
00073                         return
00074                                 (sequence_no < seq) &&
00075                                 (seq - sequence_no < 300) ||
00076                                 (sequence_no > seq) &&
00077                                 (sequence_no - seq >= 300);
00078                 }
00079                 
00080                 inline udppacket& operator <<(const std::string& str) {
00081                         const size_t& tmp = min(str.length(), _PACKET_DATA_ - 1);
00082                         memcpy(data, &str[0], tmp);
00083 
00084                         data[tmp] = 0;
00085                         return *this;
00086                 }
00087                 
00088                 inline udppacket& operator >>(std::string& str) {
00089                         str = data;
00090                         return *this;
00091                 }
00092         };
